alert.note: Alert for Polk (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 9:30PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Polk County through 1000 PM CST... At 929 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Vandervoort to 6 miles west of Gillham. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wickes... Grannis... Vandervoort... Hartley... Cossatot River State Park... Bard Springs Recreation Area... Caney Creek Wilderness... Mccauley... Cove... Shady Lake Recreation Area... Hatton... Roaring Branch Natural Area... Bogg Springs... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for western Arkansas.
